Asarai Come Clean Cleanser

Brand: Asarai

Category: Facial Cleanser

Ingredients: Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Glycerin, Sucrose Laurate, Sucrose Stearate and Sucrose Palmitate, Tilia Cordata (Linden) Extract, Terminalia Ferdinandiana (Kakadu Plum) Fruit Extract, Potassium Sorbate

Ingredient concerns: MODERATE: Allergies & Immunotoxicity, Use Re
munotoxicity, Use Restrictions; LOW: Cancer, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity
